name: Snake 3D Classic Remake
description:
The old classic Snake in 3D. Simple design, simple movement control. Just play and have fun.

Use your finger to guide the snake around the cube. Try to eat as many items as possible and make the biggest snake ever!

■ Free To Play
Snake 3D Classic Remake is absolutely free

■ Game Center integration
Snake 3D Classic Remake has Game Center achievements and highscore list
